short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Talk strats, builds, esports events, and more in this Twitch chat companion.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PogChat is a Twitch extension that provides a place to talk about streamers, games, esports, and more in a fun way.

It provides the following features:
• Login directly with Twitch
• See popular topics for streamers, games, and all of Twitch
• Customize your chat color
• Content moderation to reduce spam

How to use:

• Just install and visit Twitch to begin using the add-on
• Options can be configured in the chat panel settings
